name: RGB ON Experience
description:
Indie parkour game with wall running, high octane gameplay, different weapons and much more
Shoot the cube with X to gain score.
Right click to gain more control using slow-mo.

CONTROLS :
WASD - Movement.
Mouse - Looking around.
Spacebar - Jump.
Left Mouse Button - Fire weapon.
Right Mouse Button - Enter slow-mo.
Jump on a wall to - Enter wall run.
Jump from a wall to - Exit wall run.
